Module com.example.helloworldjfxtemplate
Package com.example.helloworldjfxtemplate.controller

Class AppointmentController

java.lang.Object
com.example.helloworldjfxtemplate.controller.AppointmentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AppointmentController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controls the implementation of the Appointment adding and modifying FXML forms. Includes validation for adding and modifying Appointments.

  • Method Details

    • onClickTitleField

      public void onClickTitleField()
      Gathers the title string from the TextField. Shows an alert and prevents saving on failure to gather a string.

    • onClickDescField

      public void onClickDescField()
      Gathers the description string from the TextField. Shows an alert and prevents saving on failure to gather a string.

    • onClickLocationField

      public void onClickLocationField()
      Gathers the location string from the TextField. Shows an alert and prevents saving on failure to gather a string.

    • onClickTypeField

      public void onClickTypeField()
      Gathers the type string from the TextField. Shows an alert and prevents saving on failure to gather a string.

    • onClickContact

      public void onClickContact()
      Gathers the selected contact from the contact ComboBox. Shows an alert and prevents saving if the ComboBox was not populated.

    • onClickUserField

      public void onClickUserField()
      Gathers the user id from the TextField. Shows an alert and prevents saving if the input was not an integer.

    • onClickStartField

      public void onClickStartField()
      Gathers the start time and date from the TextField. Shows an alert and prevents saving if the time is in an incorrect format or if the time is not within office hours.

    • onClickEndField

      public void onClickEndField()
      Gathers the end time and date from the TextField. Shows an alert and prevents saving if the time is in an incorrect format or if the time is not within office hours.

    • onClickCustomer

      public void onClickCustomer()
      Gathers the customer id from the TextField. Shows an alert and prevents saving if the input was not an integer.

    • onClickSave

      public void onClickSave(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      Handles the saving of Appointments created or modified within the form. They are then stored within the database.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - This ActionEvent is generated by the save button, and is used for the context to go back to the main form.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception thrown in cases where the Query and ResultSet handling fails.
      IOException - Exception thrown in cases where the destination of the main-menu is inaccessible.

    • onClickCancel

      public void onClickCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Handles the Cancel button which allows the user to discard any input on the form and return to the main-menu scene.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - ActionEvent given by the cancel button, used to navigate back to the main-menu scene.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception thrown in cases where the main-menu fxml is unreachable.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Method to instantiate the ComboBox selection, and in cases where the user is modifying an existing Appointment, the form is pre-filled with the given Appointment's information.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The URL to the FXML file.
      resourceBundle - Used for localized resources such as language files and images.

    • setModify

      public static void setModify(boolean modify)
      Tells the AppointmentController if the user is creating or updating an Appointment. True when the user is modifying an Appointment.
      Parameters:
      modify - Boolean passed by the MainController.

    • setAppointmentToModify

      public static void setAppointmentToModify(Appointment toModify)
      Tells the AppointmentController which appointment is to be updated.
      Parameters:
      toModify - Appointment passed by the MainController.
